text: Losoxantrone (biantrazole) is an anthroquinone anthrapyrazole antineoplastic agent and analog of mitoxantrone. It is also sometimes known as DuP 941. == See also == *Mitoxantrone *Piroxantrone == References == Category:Antineoplastic drugs Category:Topoisomerase inhibitors Category:Amines Category:Primary alcohols Category:Nitrogen heterocycles Category:Heterocyclic compounds (4 or more rings) Category:Hydroxyarenes Category:3-hydroxypropenals Category:Tetracyclic compounds Category:Triolena
title: Losoxantrone
